channel.title: UVA CS DMP
channel.description: Recent content on UVA CS DMP

item.title: DMP Requirements
item.description:
The deadline to submit your DMP report for May 2025 graduation is April 18, 2025

The deadline to submit your DMP application for May 2026 graduation is April 29, 2025

Distinguished Major in Computer Science

Bachelor of Arts Computer Science majors who have completed 18 credit hours towards their major may apply to the Distinguished Majors Program. The DMP focuses on a creative student research project as advised and approved by an advisor.

Distinguished Majors in Computer Science

Fall 2024

Clarence Chen, Distinction

Exploring Emergent Social Behavior in Large Language Models and Independent Q-Learning Agents
Advisor: Chen-Yu Wei (Second reader: Matheus V. X. Ferreira)

Spring 2024

Wenyao Zhou, High Distinction

Stock Trading with Reinforcement Learning: Average Reward Agent and Alpha Preservation
Advisor: Shangtong Zhang (Second reader: Chen-Yu Wei)

Yancheng Zhou, High Distinction

Integrating LoRaWAN and TockOS for Secure, Low-power Geolocation Solutions
Advisor: Brad Campbell (Second reader: Kun Qian)
